item.title: Spin-off
item.description: BASEL, Switzerland and LONDON, United Kingdom , Nov. 08, 2021 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Myovant Sciences (NYSE: MYOV), a healthcare company focused on redefining care for women and for men, today announced the appointment of Nancy Valente , M.D. as an independent member of the companyâ€™s Board of
